intro: An HR professional from one of our partner companies would like to connect with you about the following job opportunity:
whyTitle: Why is this being sent by JobTarget? Who is JobTarget?
whyBody: Since 2001, JobTarget has assisted hundreds of thousands of companies connect with millions of job seekers. JobTarget's technology is used to power job sites, corporate careers, and is used by thousands of companies to find and connect with talent.
withTitle: With JobTarget, you are in control
withBody: Your profile is currently incomplete and unclaimed. Click here to login and take control of your profile. This is what thousands of HR professionals and recruiters use to send you new opportunities.
